body:
Comment 3 by **wyshunter**: 
And to fix this problem, I change it like this:
package net_test
       
       import (
           "io"
           "io/ioutil"
           "os"
           "runtime"
           "testing"
           "time"
         . "net"
      )

and it works

cmd:      sudo go test net_test.go
output:   ok  	command-line-arguments	0.242s
